TEAL is revolutionizing the hydronic industry by humanizing Hot Water, Chilled Water & Hydronic Heat. TEAL's innovation design - incorporating advanced AI technology and remote monitoring - far outperforms traditional central plants, resulting in a significantly reduced carbon footprint and the lowest total lifecycle cost. The future of central plants and your next opportunity are available today! POSITION OVERVIEW: Teal is seeking a professional, skilled Python Software Developer for our Controls team. The successful candidate will work with the Teal software development team to develop and sustain technologies for HVAC commercial products. Teal operates an IOT network, which manages the operation and optimization of a distributed infrastructure system. Each node in the network uses a Teal control module to acquire data and transmit control logic to the underlying hardware. The sites utilize common HVAC hardware including air handlers, fan coils, chillers, heat pumps, and boilers. The responsibilities of this position include the design, analysis, testing and documentation of software integrated into the control PCBs (embedded computer controllers). The control module designs use Wi-Fi, ethernet, modbus, and / or bacnet for communication. The Software Developer will work with the onshore and offshore team in managing ECC upgrades and new functionality from prototype through to production. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: * Work with development team in designing programs (methods/functions) in Python * Demo, Test and qualify existing and new functionality * Identify opportunities within the existing and future firmware for continuous improvement * Use communication protocols to send and receive data from various devices * Contribute to the Agile framework, used to manage projects from concept to release * Document activities (requirements, code, schematics, layouts, etc.) * Participate on cross functional teams to launch products, resolve issues, and support product improvements * Work with Data Science on managing data from IOT network through data factory to analytics * Drive continuous improvement projects related to product design and quality QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS: * Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science * 5+ years experience with in software development, preferably related to controls or similar * Knowledge of python, HTML, Javascript and Linux like environments * Knowledge of .net and visual studio (preferred but not required) * Knowledge of databases such as sqlite, mssql, mongodb * Knowledge of consuming and calling REST APIs * Experience with ADC/DAC controls * Effective communication skills - both oral and written COMPENSATION & BENEFITS: * PTO Allotment of 120 hours / 3 weeks after 90 days of employment * Competitive Compensation * Holistic Health Coverage (medical, dental, vision, life insurance, disability), including 24/7 medical concierge services * 401k Plan with a generous employer match * 10 Paid Holidays and Birthdays off * Cell Phone Allowance * Memberships to professional organizations are paid for by the Company * Casual Dress Code * $500 cash for first time home buyers! * Teambuilding - Have fun with the team at sporting events, lunches, and other group festivities * Excellent growth and advancement opportunities. TEAL is an Equal Opportunity Employer. TEAL requires pre-employment background checks and drug screening. Company Description TEAL offers a centralized system that leverages cloud-based computing for 24/7/365 remote monitoring. Discover your managed mechanical systems as-a-service delivering uninterrupted chilled water, domestic hot water, and hydronic heat for residential and commercial developments of any size, nationwide.TEAL offers a centralized system that leverages cloud-based computing for 24/7/365 remote monitoring. Discover your managed mechanical systems as-a-service delivering uninterrupted chilled water, domestic hot water, and hydronic heat for residential and commercial developments of any size, nationwide.

Senior Python Software Engineer – 100% Remote      We are looking for someone who has worked previously as a Python Software Engineer to help us build and grow our data platform.    We are working to build optimized ingestion, ETL/ELT and reporting platforms designed to deliver insights with minimal latency.    The ideal candidate should possess most of the following:        Knowledge of OOP principals        Knowledge of Design Patterns        Ability to write advanced coding structures such as decorators, context managers, etc           Knowledge of python best coding practices (such as PEP8)        Knowledge of pandas, threading, regular expressions         Nice to have skills:     Prior experience coding in Airflow        Prior experience with Kafka        Prior experience building APIs        Prior experience with test driven development       Prior experience with AWS, Kubernetes, Docker

Accepting remote candidates in the following states: Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, Florida, Maryland, Minnesota, North Carolina, Nevada, Texas, Virginia, Washington, and Wisconsin. TensorIoT is seeking a Mid-Senior Level Python Developer to become an integral part of our team! Leveraging the AWS (Amazon Web Services) platform we work to build new and unique solutions in the smart devices vertical across many different industry sectors. We're looking for tech-savvy enthusiasts with a passion for IoT (Internet of Things) and or ML/AI (Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence). Apply today and join our team! Responsibilities: * Analyze user needs and develop software solutions * Work with project manager or product owner to meet specification needs * Recommend software upgrades to optimize operational efficiency * Collaborate with other developers to design and optimize code * Create flowcharts and user guides for new and existing programs * Document all programming tasks and procedures * Perform routine software maintenance * Collaborate with external clients and internal team members to meet product deadlines Qualifications: * BS in Computer Science, Engineering or Related Fields * 3+ years of previous experience in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields * Strong experience with Python, Node.JS, TypeScript, AWS, and GraphQL * Familiarity and comfort with REST APIs Preferred (Not Required): * IoT/ML/AI/VR Experience * Experience with BlackDuck, Sonar, CircleCl, Zephyr Company Description TensorIoT's founders helped build world-class IoT and AI platforms at AWS, and Google and are now creating solutions to simplify the way enterprises incorporate edge devices and their data into their day to day operations. Our mission is to help connect devices and make them smarter. Our founders firmly believe in the transformative potential of smarter devices to enhance our quality of life and we're just getting started! Connect with us today to learn more!TensorIoT's founders helped build world-class IoT and AI platforms at AWS, and Google and are now creating solutions to simplify the way enterprises incorporate edge devices and their data into their day to day operations. Our mission is to help connect devices and make them smarter. Our founders firmly believe in the transformative potential of smarter devices to enhance our quality of life and we're just getting started! Connect with us today to learn more!

We are looking for an experienced Mid-Senior Level Python Developer to join our team! At our company, we specialize in creating unique and innovative solutions for smart devices across a wide range of industries, all while leveraging the power of AWS (Amazon Web Services). We are seeking tech-savvy individuals with a passion for IoT (Internet of Things) and/or ML/AI (Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence) to help us continue to push the boundaries of what's possible.As a member of our team, you will be responsible for analyzing user needs and developing software solutions, working with project managers and product owners to meet specification needs, collaborating with other developers to design and optimize code, creating flowcharts and user guides for new and existing programs, and documenting all programming tasks and procedures. You will also perform routine software maintenance and collaborate with external clients and internal team members to meet product deadlines.The ideal candidate will have a BS in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields and at least 3 years of previous experience in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields. Strong experience with Python, Node.JS, TypeScript, AWS, and GraphQL is required, as well as familiarity and comfort with REST APIs.While not required, experience with IoT/ML/AI/VR or tools like BlackDuck, Sonar, CircleCl, and Zephyr is a plus.At our company, we believe in the transformative potential of smarter devices to enhance our quality of life, and we are dedicated to making that a reality. Our founders come from a background of building world-class IoT and AI platforms at AWS and Google, and are now focused on creating solutions that simplify the way enterprises incorporate edge devices and their data into their day-to-day operations. If you share our passion and are excited to be part of a team that is just getting started, we encourage you to apply today and join our mission to help connect devices and make them smarter!Note: This job is open to remote candidates based in Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, Florida, Maryland, Minnesota, North Carolina, Nevada, Texas, Virginia, Washington, and Wisconsin.Employment Type: Full-TimeSalary: $ 95,000.00 125,000.00 Per Year

Experience with API security frameworks, token management and user access control including OAuth, JWT, etc. Solid foundation and understanding of relational and NoSQL database principles. Well organized with a bias for action with minimal direction. A team player with a start-up/entrepreneur mindset. Ravenous about learning technology and problem solving. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Understanding of OOP and Data Structures and know when to apply them in daily coding scenarios Background task processing (Celery, etc.) Experience configuring container like systems (Vagrant, Docker, etc.) Basic understanding of modern web components (HTML/CSS/JS) Ability to self-organize with minimal guidance/competing priorities and work effectively within a team Large organization experience - Large Scale projects Ability to work in an Agile/SCRUM environment.

Advanced Robotics Group, LLC is looking for select individuals who are seriously good at what they do and want to join a small elite team defying conventional wisdom regarding what is possible with robotics. ARG is a driven team of technology experts developing a portfolio of non-consumer robots to operate fully autonomously in exceptionally demanding environments. Accompanying our robotics solutions, we are refining a pioneering proprietary analytics platform providing deep insights from hundreds of terabytes of data. Over the last 10 years, we have developed solutions to a range of autonomous robotics and analytics challenges still thought to be impossible by the outside and are expanding and refining our portfolio of solutions before emerging from stealth and going to market with a global footprint. We solve the most difficult challenges. We need additional talented, driven individuals to join our Team, and we recently expanded into a second technology development office in Houston giving us over 14,000 square feet of long-term space to help accommodate our growth. We compensate generously and provide full medical, disability, and vision coverage, plus fun lunches and a stocked kitchen. As a Software Developer Python/Django , you will create the software that enables our customers to explore our industry-changing, data-driven product. You willCollaborate with a motivated interdisciplinary development team to create the software that provides geographical visualizations of terabytes of data collected from unmanned robotic missions,Build world-class expertise in innovative technologies growing as a technical leader and product owner,Work hands-on in a creative, organic start-up environment focused on delivering highly innovative solutions,Design, develop, and test full-stack software solutions,Design front-end user experience with a focus on intuitive ease of use,Grow rapidly professionally. What we're looking for:Strong experience with Python and Django. Experience with web application architectures and UNIX environments. Experience with PostgreSQL and MongoDB (or similar SQL and NoSQL technologies). Experience with git and excellent software development practices. Personal discipline to maintain strict confidentiality instinctively. BS/MS in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field with 2+ years of applicable industry experience. Nice to haves:Experience with containerization technologies like Docker or Kubernetes. Experience with cloud-based architectures and deployment (AWS or Azure). Experience with Data Pipelines, Airflow, or other similar technologies. Experience with CI/CD pipelines. Location: Main development center in Houston, Texas Company Description Due to the confidential nature of our activities, we aren't able to share specifics with you now but know that these robotics solutions will have a significant impact on both safety and the environment, thus making the world better. Due to the confidential nature of our activities, we aren’t able to share specifics with you now but know that these robotics solutions will have a significant impact on both safety and the environment, thus making the world better.
